text: Anapirika Iteon, neighbourhood of Patras The abandoned building of Ities Patras old railway station. Anapirika Iteon () is a neighbourhood in the southern part of the city of Patras. The origin of the name ("Disabled people area") probably derives from the properties of war disabled people there. ==Nearest places== * Ities, south * Kokkinos Milos, south * Krya Iteon, north * Lefka, east * Paralia, south ==References== * Δ. Καρατζά, Χ. Χαραλάμπους, Δ. Γκότση, Γ. Λύρα, Πάτρα, ονομάτων επίσκεψις, Έκδοση των εφημερίδων Εθνικός Κήρυξ των Πατρών και Ημερήσιος Κήρυξ των Πατρών, Πάτρα 1995, p. 271 (in Greek) Category:Neighborhoods in Patras
title: Anapirika Iteon, Patras
